item.title: Tsumi Hematite, Volcanic Lava Rock and Pyrite Necklace TS203
item.dc:creator: onewithclouds
item.description:
Minimalist and elegant, this gorgeous necklace is a testament to the beauty and timelessness of authentic and original design. Inspired by the Moon, this necklace is not only photogenic, but also absolutely stunning when experienced in person. In the hand, this necklace feels pleasant to the touch with its materials harmoniously complementing each other and its minimal design emanating an atmosphere of completeness. The materials used in this item include symmetrically arranged elements of hematite, as well as a rich golden brown pyrite mineral that adorns a brass chain extension. Adding to the unique atmospheric charm of this composition are two cubic volcanic lava beads. Overall, this is a minimalist masterpiece showcasing the creative vision, experience and skill of Iwona Domanska, an incredible designer behind the Tsumi brand.

Materials: Hematite, Brass, Lava Rock (Volcanic Rock), Pyrite. Front Drop - 21 cm (8.27").

The post Tsumi Hematite, Volcanic Lava Rock and Pyrite Necklace TS203 appeared first on Nuage Showroom.
item.content:encoded:
Minimalist and elegant, this gorgeous necklace is a testament to the beauty and timelessness of authentic and original design. Inspired by the Moon, this necklace is not only photogenic, but also absolutely stunning when experienced in person. In the hand, this necklace feels pleasant to the touch with its materials harmoniously complementing each other and its minimal design emanating an atmosphere of completeness. The materials used in this item include symmetrically arranged elements of hematite, as well as a rich golden brown pyrite mineral that adorns a brass chain extension. Adding to the unique atmospheric charm of this composition are two cubic volcanic lava beads. Overall, this is a minimalist masterpiece showcasing the creative vision, experience and skill of Iwona Domanska, an incredible designer behind the Tsumi brand.

Materials

Pyrite is a stunning mineral that bears incredible resemblance to gold. The fire is often sad to be hidden with its gleaming beauty. Pyrite is a stone that is brought to life by striking it against another stone or metal, producing plentiful sparks. Hence this mineral is often appearing as a stone of action vitality and will. A stone that taps into a person’s abilities and potential. This beautiful stone is believed to bring confidence and persistence to carry things to completion. A stone with a strong connection to Earth element, it closely resonates with Fire as well, providing for a symbolic connection between the two. Pyrite is often thought of as reminiscent of the warmth and lasting presence of the sun, as well as the ability to generate desirable outcomes by one’s own power.

Hematite is one of the prettiest and most unique crystals used in jewelry accessories. This crystal provides a unique combination of shiny charisma, while retaining the ability to remain reserved. It is one of the few magnetic crystals the structure of which is dominated by iron. Hematite is often referred to as a ‘seeker crystal’ that helps one find a new path or approach to gain something you desire, but not yet posses. Hematite crystals are thought to have great grounding and balancing effect, as well as serving to stimulate mind, memory, sometimes evoking deep thought.

Lava rock, volcanic rock or basalt is a beautiful matte black stone with an incredible texture. It is believed to be an excellent grounding stone, strengthening one’s connection to Mother Earth and providing stability in the time of change. Lava rock is also often thought of as a physical embodiment of fire, being a stone that started as fiery molten lava, subsequently turning into rock.

About Tsumi

Tsumi is a brand born from the love of fashion, as well as an inherent need to be original and unique. Each Tsumi accessory is infused by a touch of authentic ethnic flair and is inspired by joyful memories of traveling the world. Tsumi accessories are crafted with an incredible skill, while remaining visionary and creative pieces of contemporary jewelry.

Most of Tsumi accessories are made in either limited quantity or in one unique specimen. Tsumi is also synonymous with an exceptional selection of original and rare materials used to create their stylish accessories. These include semi-precious stones, corals, pearls and crystals, making Tsumi jewelry not only an embodiment of original style, but also an experience.

The post Tsumi Hematite, Volcanic Lava Rock and Pyrite Necklace TS203 appeared first on Nuage Showroom.
